name: @netwerk-digitaal-erfgoed/solid-crs-webid
description: Community Solid Server as host for NDE WebID documents
author: Wouter Janssens <wouter@digita.ai>

scripts.start: shx rm -rf tmp/ && shx mkdir tmp && shx cp -r data/development/. tmp/ && community-solid-server -c config/file.json --rootFilePath ./tmp -p 3007
